created_at.description: Date and time when the cadence was created

updated_at.description: Date and time when the cadence was last updated

archived_at.description: Date and time when the cadence was archived

team_cadence.description: Indicates if the cadence is a team cadence

shared.description: Indicates if the cadence is shared

remove_bounces_enabled.description: Indicates if bounce removal is enabled

remove_replies_enabled.description: Indicates if reply removal is enabled

opt_out_link_included.description: Indicates if an opt-out link is included in the cadence

tags.description: List of tags associated with the cadence

creator.description: Information about the creator of the cadence

owner.description: Information about the owner of the cadence

bounced_stage.description: Information about the stage for contacts who have bounced

_href.description: Hyperlink reference to bounced stage details

id.description: Unique identifier for the bounced stage

replied_stage.description: Information about the stage for contacts who have replied

_href.description: Hyperlink reference to replied stage details

id.description: Unique identifier for the replied stage

added_stage.description: Information about the stage where contacts are added to the cadence

_href.description: Hyperlink reference to added stage details

id.description: Unique identifier for the added stage

finished_stage.description: Information about the stage where contacts finish the cadence

_href.description: Hyperlink reference to finished stage details

id.description: Unique identifier for the finished stage

cadence_people.description: Number of people in the cadence

target_daily_people.description: Target daily number of people in the cadence

latest_active_date.description: Latest date when the cadence was active
